name: WSA20-MPX-04000-EL-ITR-31001003 Conduit Install
Receipt of conduit delivery to site & storage. (ITP Reference Item 1)
Set out. (ITP Reference Item 2)
Excavation - Correct trenching alignment & depth. (ITP Reference Item 3)
Signoff Required from Heyday & Multiplex
Conduit Installation. (ITP Reference Item 4)
Spacer Frame Installation. (ITP Reference Item 5)
Change of direction/bend Installation, correct bending radius used as per drawing. (ITP Reference Item 6)
Bellmouths installed within Insitu Pits. (ITP Reference Item 7)
Glue Conduits together. (ITP Reference Item 8)
TSB Installation around & above conduits. (ITP Reference Item 9)
Signoff Required from Heyday & Multiplex
150mm cover of backfill above TSB. (ITP Reference Item 10)
Warning tape installation above 150mm cover. (ITP Reference Item 11)
Back fill & compact. (ITP Reference Item 12)
Rope & pathway test. (ITP Reference Item 13)
Sealing of conduits. (ITP Reference Item 14) HOLD POINT
Signoff Required from Heyday & Multiplex
ITP Attachment
Please attach copy of ITP
